lines.i: Indication of whether the transport was emergent or non-emergent

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.33"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11138)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10674)/@code="67550-4" Transport mode from scene NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10673)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10675), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportationMode 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.66 DYNAMIC (CONF:10676)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.17 (disposition transport mode)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:11379)
This entryRelationship contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Transport Mode Qualifier (CONF:11339)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11138)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10674)/@code="67550-4" Transport mode from scene NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10673)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10675), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportationMode 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.66 DYNAMIC (CONF:10676)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.17 (disposition transport mode)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:11379)
This entryRelationship contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Transport Mode Qualifier (CONF:11339)
